meanings.definition: The quality of being free from bias or injustice.
meanings.sent1: In the game, everyone agreed on the fairness of the rules.
meanings.sent2: The fairness of the judge's decision was appreciated by all.
meanings.sent3: The fairness of the situation made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her fairness shone like a beacon in the dark world of politics.
meanings.sent5: The fairness of her actions left a lasting impression on everyone.
